Detailed Description

template<class T>
class bd::ReferenceCountedArray< T >::Cref

Safe element reading and writing.

Todo:
This should not provide copy constructors for Cref, they shouldn't be needed because of const char String::operator[] This class should be optimized away and fully inlined such that: String s; s[0] = 'a'; Should be rewritten as: s.write(0, 'a');

Stroustrup shows using this as void with no return value, but that breaks chaining a[n] = b[n] = 'b';
